article_title: Ratepayers decry R.I. Blue Cross request for rate hikes
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox

article_metadata.description: WARWICK, R.I. — Blue Cross & Blue Shield of Rhode Island spent the better part of Tuesday presenting its case for why it should be granted double-digit rate hikes in 2016 for "direct pay" plans it offers to individuals. But at the end of the daylong hearing, Rhode Island's largest insurer met stiff resistance from a small number of angry ratepayers."Where are we supposed to be getting the money from?" Suzanne Martin, of West Greenwich, demanded to know. Because she and her
article_metadata.author: Richard Salit
